937510.name: Overclocked - Official Soundtrack
937510.description:
The Overclocked Official Soundtrack contains the following tracks:

Fire Under Her Feet
According to Plan
One Step Ahead
Going Underground
Straight to the Top
Into the Labyrinth
Full Circle
Consequences
Tribulation
What's Right
Closure
Fire Under Her Feet - Dialogue Mix
According to Plan - Dialogue Mix
One Step Ahead - Dialogue Mix
Going Underground - Dialogue Mix
Straight to the Top - Dialogue Mix
Into the Labyrinth - Dialogue Mix
Full Circle - Dialogue Mix
Consequences - Dialogue Mix
Tribulation - Dialogue Mix
What's Right - Dialogue Mix
Closure - Dialogue Mix
Fire Under Her Feet - 16-bit
According to Plan - 16-bit


All songs come in both MP3 and FLAC quality.

Once purchased, all files will be downloaded to:
Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/Overclocked/Overclocked Official Soundtrack
937510.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
